javadoc: Text field captures key strokes and notifies a listener to process the key entry.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new entry text field.

params.name: columns
params.comment: number of columns in the text field

params.name: listener
params.comment: listener that is notified when the a key is pressed

methods.javadoc:
Get the current key stroke
@return the key stroke
methods.name: getKeyStroke

methods.javadoc:
Sets the current key stroke
@param ks the new key stroke
methods.name: setKeyStroke
parseKeyStroke
methods.comment:
Converts the toString() form of the keyStroke, e.g., Ctrl-M is returned as 
 "keyCode CtrlM-P" and we want it to look like: "Ctrl-M"

return.comment: the parse string for the keystroke

name: KeyEntryTextField
comment: Text field captures key strokes and notifies a listener to process the key entry.
